Characteristic.name: Blood Pressure Measurement

InformativeText.Abstract: The Blood Pressure Measurement characteristic is a variable length structure containing a Flags field, a Blood Pressure Measurement Compound Value field, and contains additional fields such as Time Stamp, Pulse Rate and User ID as determined by the contents of the Flags field.

Field.name: Flags
Field.InformativeText: These flags define which data fields are present in the Characteristic value

Enumeration.value: Blood pressure for Systolic, Diastolic and MAP in units of mmHg
Blood pressure for Systolic, Diastolic and MAP in units of kPa

Field.name: Blood Pressure Measurement Compound Value - Systolic (mmHg)
Field.InformativeText: C1: Field exists if the key of bit 0 of the Flags field is set to 0

Field.name: Blood Pressure Measurement Compound Value - Diastolic (mmHg)
Field.InformativeText: C1: Field exists if the key of bit 0 of the Flags field is set to 0

Field.name: Blood Pressure Measurement Compound Value - Mean Arterial Pressure (mmHg)
Field.InformativeText: C1: Field exists if the key of bit 0 of the Flags field is set to 0

Field.name: Blood Pressure Measurement Compound Value - Systolic (kPa)
Field.InformativeText: C2: Field exists if the key of bit 0 of the Flags field is set to 1

Field.name: Blood Pressure Measurement Compound Value - Diastolic (kPa)
Field.InformativeText: C2: Field exists if the key of bit 0 of the Flags field is set to 1

Field.name: Blood Pressure Measurement Compound Value - Mean Arterial Pressure (kPa)
Field.InformativeText: C2: Field exists if the key of bit 0 of the Flags field is set to 1

Field.name: Time Stamp
Field.InformativeText: C3: Field exists if the key of bit 1 of the Flags field is set to 1

Field.name: Pulse Rate
Field.InformativeText: C4: Field exists if the key of bit 2 of the Flags field is set to 1

Field.name: User ID
Field.InformativeText: C5: Field exists if the key of bit 3 of the Flags field is set to 1

Field.name: Measurement Status
Field.InformativeText: C6: Field exists if the key of bit 4 of the Flags field is set to 1

Enumeration.value: Pulse rate is within the range
Pulse rate is less than lower limit

Characteristic.Note: The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet and MAP = Mean Arterial Pressure.
